credentials: PHD 2024 New Jersey Inst Of Technology
name: Yassine TISSAOUI

ratings.comment: I had Professor Tissaoui for MATH 340, and he wasn't too bad. The only bad thing about his lectures is there is a lot of content he covers within a short period of time(which is probably due to the course structure) and his handwriting isn't the best either. But he is probably one of the better lecturers for MATH 340, so I would recommend him.
this dudes handwriting is so bad its almost impossible to follow along in class.

Professor Tissaoui was able to explain things well during lecture, but his handwriting was terrible. It ended up being alright though, because he ended up posting another professor's notes with better handwriting (that was in the exact same format) for us!

Yassine was alright as a professor. I think the biggest setback is the pre-written slides he presents for lecture. There is a book to read before class, but lecture takes care of it. His handwriting is be desired at many moments. Complex ideas weren't articulated as clearly one wanted. A lot of times there was a question of "why".
